itefjtngton, 2B.C.*
April 10, 1967
Mr. William R. Boehle, Chairman
Department of Music
University of Worth Dakota
Grand Forks, North Dakota
Dear Mr. Boehle:
Thank you for your letter suggesting a change in the title of
the Public Television Act of 1967.
H.R. 6736 is an identical bill to S. Il60. Therefore, your
suggestions are applicable to each. I have taken the liberty
of sending a copy of your letter to Senator Magnuson, Chairman
of the Senate Committee on Commerce and Representative Staggers,
Chairman of the House Interstate and Foreign Commerce Committee,
sponsors of these bills.
Thank you, again, for advising me of your views on this
legislation.
Best wishes.
Sincerely,
MARK ANDREWS
Member of Congress
